00004 #include <boost/type_traits/is_arithmetic.hpp>

00010 namespace data

00013 namespace _internal

00016 // actual implementation of the scalar-byte-swap (generic version)
00017 template<uint_fast8_t SIZE> struct SwapImpl {
00018     template<typename TYPE> static TYPE doSwap( const TYPE &src ) {
00019         TYPE ret = 0;
00020         uint8_t *retPtr = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>( &ret );
00021         const uint8_t *srcPtr = reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>( &src );
00022 
00023         for ( uint_fast8_t i = 0; i < SIZE; i++ )
00024             retPtr[i] =  srcPtr[SIZE - 1 - i];
00025 
00026         return ret;
00027     }
00028 };
00029 // specialisation (swapping 1 byte might be a bit useless)
00030 template<> struct SwapImpl<1> {
00031     template<typename TYPE> static TYPE doSwap( const TYPE &src ) {return src;}
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00035 // gatekeeper for SwapImpl (do not allow swapping of types we do not know about)
00036 template<typename TYPE, bool IS_NUM> struct EndianSwapper {
00037     static TYPE swap( const TYPE &src ) {
00038         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Sorry, endianess swap for " << util::Value<TYPE>::staticName() << " is not supportet";
00039         return src;
00040     }
00041 };
00042 
00043 // plain numeric scalar - directly use doSwap
00044 template<typename TYPE> struct EndianSwapper<TYPE, true> {
00045     static TYPE swap( const TYPE &src ) {return SwapImpl<sizeof( TYPE )>::doSwap( src );}
00046 };
00047 
00048 //color-struct - do swap for each color
00049 template<typename TYPE> struct EndianSwapper<util::color<TYPE>, false> {
00050     static util::color<TYPE> swap( const util::color<TYPE> &src ) {
00051         util::color<TYPE> ret;
00052         ret.r = EndianSwapper<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value>::swap( src.r );
00053         ret.g = EndianSwapper<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value>::swap( src.g );
00054         ret.b = EndianSwapper<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value>::swap( src.b );
00055         return ret;
00056     }
00057 };
00058 
00059 // lists - do swap for each entry
00060 template<typename TYPE> struct EndianSwapper<std::list<TYPE>, false> {
00061     static std::list<TYPE> swap( const std::list<TYPE> &src ) {
00062         std::list<TYPE> ret;
00063         std::transform( src.begin(), src.end(), ret.begin(), EndianSwapper<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value>::swap );
00064         return ret;
00065     }
00066 };
00067 
00068 // FixedVector - do swap for each entry
00069 template<typename TYPE, size_t SIZE> struct EndianSwapper<util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE>, false> {
00070     static util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> swap( const util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> &src ) {
00071         util::FixedVector<TYPE, SIZE> ret;
00072         std::transform( src.begin(), src.end(), ret.begin(), EndianSwapper<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value>::swap );
00073         return ret;
00074     }
00075 };
00076 } //_internal
00078 
00079 // public interface
00080 template<typename T> static  T endianSwap( const T &var )
00081 {
00082     return _internal::EndianSwapper<T, boost::is_arithmetic< T >::value >::swap( var );
00083 }
00084 template<typename ITER, typename TITER> static  void endianSwapArray( const ITER begin, const ITER end, TITER target )
00085 {
00086     for( ITER i = begin; i != end; i++, target++ ) {
00087         *target = endianSwap( *i );
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 }
00092 }
